name: Christopher C. OBST, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Obst v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Christopher C. OBST, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of June, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the orders appealed are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
851 A.2d 835
Christopher C. OBST, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
Nos. 23 & 43 MAP 2004.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 3, 2004.
